description: Everytime I open Jellyfin and start a video I do not have sound. I have to close the app and go the snapstore to reset the permissions there.

This version of the player enables great support for direct play instead of having to transcode videos. I was pleasantly surprised with just how smooth and responsive this community version feels. It's a much better experience than the desktop client on windows, and that despite running it on a much slower machine. I recommend you give this one a try.
summary: Best way to watch jellyfin media

description: Straightforward install on KDE. Works perfectly right out of the box. Thanks!
Can't pause or play with my keyboard media controls or Plasma's media widget
summary: Not integrated with Plasma's media controls
